urls.title: EA to ditch hard flood defences in favour of nature-based solutions
urls.description: The Environment Agency (EA) has pledged to ditch hard, carbon-intensive concrete flood defences in favour of nature-based solutions ‚Äúwherever possible‚Äù under plans it has set out to achieve net zero carbon emissions by 2030.

text:

We welcome the @EnvAgency's fresh commitment to boost natural flood management by prioritising habitat restoration. üíßüåø
